languages.text: {n}Арджента подлетает к последнему оставшемуся в живых культисту и молча, яростно бьет его по лицу.{/n} "Нечестивый еретик! К кому вы обращали молитву?! Мне знакомы эти слова, этот зов к "Влады..."
{n}Argenta rushes to the last living cultist and silently, furiously punches him in the face.{/n} "Blaspheming heretic! Who were you praying to? I know those words, that call to a 'Lor—'"
languages.original_text: {n}Арджента подлетает к последнему оставшемуся в живых культисту и молча, яростно бьет его по лицу.{/n} "Нечестивый еретик! К кому вы обращали молитву?! Мне знакомы эти слова, этот зов к "Влады..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta rushes to the last living cultist and silently, furiously punches him in the face.{/n} "Blaspheming heretic! To whom were you offering your prayer? I know these words, this call to a 'Lor—'"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta rushes to the last living cultist and silently, furiously punches him in the face.{/n} "Blaspheming heretic! To whom were you offering your prayer? I know these words, this call to a 'Lor—'"

traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta rushes to the last living cultist and silently, furiously punches him in the face.{/n} "Blaspheming heretic! Who were you praying to? I know those words, that call to a 'Lor—'"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta rushes to the last living cultist and silently, furiously punches him in the face.{/n} "Blaspheming heretic! Who were you praying to? I know those words, that call to a 'Lor—'"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}阿洁塔冲向最后一个活着的邪教徒，愤怒地朝他脸上捣了一拳。{/n}“你这亵渎神明的异端分子！你刚刚在向谁祈祷？我听过你们的祷词，那个被你们称为‘主’的家伙——”
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta rushes to the last living cultist and silently, furiously punches him in the face.{/n} "Blaspheming heretic! Who were you praying to? I know those words, that call to a 'Lor—'"

traits.locale_text: {n}阿洁塔冲向最后一个活着的邪教徒，愤怒地朝他脸上捣了一拳。{/n}“你这亵渎神明的异端分子！你刚刚在向谁祈祷？我听过你们的祷词，那个被你们称为‘主’的家伙——”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta corre hasta el último sectario vivo y, sin decir nada, le pega un puñetazo en la cara.{/n} «¡Hereje blasfemo! ¿A quién rezas? Conozco esas palabras que apelan a un Seño...».
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta rushes to the last living cultist and silently, furiously punches him in the face.{/n} "Blaspheming heretic! Who were you praying to? I know those words, that call to a 'Lor—'"

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta corre hasta el último sectario vivo y, sin decir nada, le pega un puñetazo en la cara.{/n} "¡Hereje blasfemo! ¿A quién rezas? Conozco esas palabras que apelan a un Seño...».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}アルジェンタは生きている最後の教団信者に駆け寄り、無言で彼の顔を激しく殴りつける。{/n}「神を冒涜する異端者め！誰に向かって祈っていた？我はその言葉を知っている、その呼びかけは…」
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta rushes to the last living cultist and silently, furiously punches him in the face.{/n} "Blaspheming heretic! Who were you praying to? I know those words, that call to a 'Lor—'"

traits.locale_text: {n}アルジェンタは生きている最後の教団信者に駆け寄り、無言で彼の顔を激しく殴りつける。{/n}「神を冒涜する異端者め！誰に向かって祈っていた？我はその言葉を知っている、その呼びかけは…」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta eilt zu dem letzten lebenden Kultisten und schlägt ihm schweigend und zornig mitten ins Gesicht.{/n} "Gotteslästerlicher Ketzer! Zu wem habt Ihr gebetet? Ich kenne diese Worte, gerichtet an einen 'Herren' ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta rushes to the last living cultist and silently, furiously punches him in the face.{/n} "Blaspheming heretic! Who were you praying to? I know those words, that call to a 'Lor—'"

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta eilt zu dem letzten lebenden Kultisten und schlägt ihm schweigend und zornig mitten ins Gesicht.{/n} "Gotteslästerlicher Ketzer! Zu wem habt Ihr gebetet? Ich kenne diese Worte, gerichtet an einen 'Herren' ..."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta se précipite vers le dernier cultiste en vie et, sans un mot, lui assène un coup de poing furieux en plein visage.{/n} « Infâme hérétique ! À qui s'adressait votre prière ? J'ai déjà entendu cette supplique qui implore un certain "seign..." »
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta rushes to the last living cultist and silently, furiously punches him in the face.{/n} "Blaspheming heretic! Who were you praying to? I know those words, that call to a 'Lor—'"

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta se précipite vers le dernier cultiste en vie et, sans un mot, lui assène un coup de poing furieux en plein visage.{/n} « Infâme hérétique ! À qui s'adressait votre prière ? J'ai déjà entendu cette supplique qui implore un certain "seign..." »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta, son sağ tarikatçıya doğru atılıyor. Çıt çıkarmadan, tüm hiddetiyle adamın yüzüne sağlam bir yumruk geçiriyor.{/n} "Günahkâr kâfir! Kime yakarıyordun? O aşağılık sözlere aşinayım! Sözde 'Lord'..."
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta rushes to the last living cultist and silently, furiously punches him in the face.{/n} "Blaspheming heretic! Who were you praying to? I know those words, that call to a 'Lor—'"

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta, hayatta kalan son tarikatçıya doğru atılıyor. Çıt çıkarmadan, tüm hiddetiyle adamın yüzüne sağlam bir yumruk geçiriyor.{/n} "Günahkâr kâfir! Kime yakarıyordun? O aşağılık sözlere aşinayım! Sözde 'Lord'…"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
